type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Structure

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure).

Checks whether an entity is standing inside a specific structure or a structure that belongs to a specific tag.

Type ID: `apugli:structure`



---

### ⚠️ Caution

This condition is only effective server-side. That means client-side power types such as [`apoli:climbing`](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure), [`apoli:entity_glow`](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure), [`apoli:shader`](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure), etc. won't work with this.





---
type.markdownDescription:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Structure

---



[Entity Condition Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure).

Checks whether an entity is standing inside a specific structure or a structure that belongs to a specific tag.

Type ID: `apugli:structure`



---

### ⚠️ Caution

This condition is only effective server-side. That means client-side power types such as [`apoli:climbing`](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure), [`apoli:entity_glow`](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure), [`apoli:shader`](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/structure), etc. won't work with this.





---

structure.description: ID of the structure the entity needs to be in to pass the check.
structure.markdownDescription: ID of the structure the entity needs to be in to pass the check.

tag.description: ID of the tag of structures the entity needs to be in to pass the check.
tag.markdownDescription: ID of the tag of structures the entity needs to be in to pass the check.
